EmailTemplate.name: 20NovWeb-Workflow-Mgmt.Invite 2.0
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, your time management webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There's still time for you to join us on Wednesday, November 20 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "Workflow and Time Management Tips for the Self-Employed Workforce <http://info.mbopartners.com/20NovWebWorkflowMgmt_RegistrationPage.html>."
MBO Partners is inviting expert executive consultant, facilitator and trainer Perry Pockros to present a 3 part workflow framework to maximize the efficiency of your solo business. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/20NovWebWorkflowMgmt_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
